Installation
============

NuGet Interface
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

| To install PGPSUtilsAEFC in your project, simply navigate to the NuGet interface in your IDE, and type "PGPSUtilsAEFC", from there, simply add it to your project, and you're good to go.

.. image:: ../images/installation_nuget_search.png
  :alt: searching
  
.. image:: ../images/installation_nuget_install.png
  :alt: installing
